lines.text:
[to Alexis, after winning yet another catfight]
Now, if you'll excuse me, I have a husband to meet up with, a plane to catch, and a home to get back to. What are your plans? Then again, who gives a damn?

[to Alexis]
Weren't you my mother-in-law at one time?
lines.character: Samantha Josephine 'Sammy Jo' Dean Carrington Reece Fallmont

lines.text:
[to Sammy Jo]
Your days are numbered, bimbo.
lines.character: Alexis Morrell Carrington Colby Dexter Rowan
